root.description: High-speed Solana arbitrage bot written in Rust, designed to exploit price differences across DEXes like Raydium, Orca, and Meteora.  solana-arbitrage-rust-bot is a fast, low-latency trading bot written in Rust that performs on-chain arbitrage between decentralized exchanges on Solana.
